UserCode.Misc
Class MouseClickHandler

java.lang.Object
  UserCode.Misc.MouseClickHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
IObservable, IMouseClickHandler
public class MouseClickHandler
extends Object
implements IMouseClickHandler

MouseClickHandler is the concrete implementation of the IMouseClickHandler interface. This class is used to monitor an Env world to check if the left mouse button has been clicked and notify an IObserver class

Version:
3.0
Author:
Marc Price & Chris Williams

Constructor for objects of class MouseHandler. This constructor is for testing purposes only

MouseClickHandler

public MouseClickHandler(env3d.Env env)
Constructor for objects of class MouseHandler

Parameters:
env - a reference to an Env class which this class will monitor for left mouse clicks
Method Detail

addObserver

public void addObserver(IObserver _o)
METHOD: used to add an IObserver concrete class to the single _observer field. This will then be notified once a left click is detected

Specified by:
addObserver in interface IObservable
Parameters:
_o - the IObserver class that will be notified once the left mouse button is clicked

checkMouse

public void checkMouse()
METHOD: this method should be continually used to check if the Env world has detected a left mouse click. Onced clicked it will update the _mouseX & _mouseY fields and call the notifyObservers() method

Specified by:
checkMouse in interface IMouseClickHandler

getObserver

@Deprecated
public IObserver getObserver()
Deprecated. 

Specified by:
getObserver in interface IObservable

getUpdate

public double[] getUpdate()
METHOD: used to get the mouse x & y coordinates. This method should be used by an IObserver once this class has called the IObserver update method, as a new click event has occurred

Specified by:
getUpdate in interface IObservable
Returns:
double[] the mouse x and y coords of the left click event location

getWorldRef

@Deprecated
public env3d.Env getWorldRef()
Deprecated. 

Specified by:
getWorldRef in interface IMouseClickHandler

notifyObservers

public void notifyObservers()
METHOD: used to notify the IObserver that an event has occurred. This method firstly checks if an IObserver has been initialised in the _observer field and then calls the IObserver update() method

Specified by:
notifyObservers in interface IObservable

removeObserver

public void removeObserver(IObserver _o)
METHOD: used to remove the single IObserver held in the _observer field. This sets the field to null

Specified by:
removeObserver in interface IObservable
Parameters:
_o - this removes any reference to the IObserver in the _observer field
